metadata.title: CVE-2021-3478 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: There's a flaw in OpenEXR's scanline input file functionality in versions before 3.0.0-beta. An attacker able to submit a crafted file to be processed by OpenEXR could consume excessive system memory. The greatest impact of this flaw is to system availability.

criterions.comment: openexr package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
